articles.description: The 35-year-old Mank star and newly minted Oscar nominee will next be seen in Hulu's limited series The Dropout as disgraced Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes.
articles.content:
Amanda Seyfried is following up her acclaimed role in Mank and her first Oscar nomination with a starring role as the disgraced Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes.
The 35-year-old actress will play t… [+4151 chars]
